table.name: application
table.remarks: Base data for applications including the ID, key dates, and the date of the first decision

column.name: source
column.remarks: Determines where the application came from

column.name: alr_area
column.remarks: Area in hectares of ALR impacted by the proposal

column.name: ag_cap
column.remarks: Agricultural cap classification

column.name: ag_cap_source
column.remarks: Agricultural capability classification system used

column.name: ag_cap_map
column.remarks: Agricultural capability map sheet reference

column.name: ag_cap_consultant
column.remarks: Consultant who determined the agricultural capability

column.name: nfu_use_type
column.remarks: Non-farm use type

column.name: nfu_use_sub_type
column.remarks: Non-farm use sub type

column.name: staff_observations
column.remarks: ALC Staff Observations and Comments

column.name: incl_excl_applicant_type
column.remarks: Inclusion Exclusion Applicant Type

column.name: legacy_id
column.remarks: Application Id that is applicable only to paper version applications from 70s - 80s

table.name: application_boundary_amendment
table.remarks: Used by ALC GIS Staff to track Inclusion / Exclusion decisions and their ALR boundary impact over time

column.name: file_number
column.remarks: File number of the application

column.name: type
column.remarks: Type of Amendment, Inclusion or Exclusion

column.name: area
column.remarks: Area in hectares of the amendment

column.name: year
column.remarks: Year the amendment took place

column.name: period
column.remarks: Period of the year the amendment took place (1 - 4)

column.name: oats_component_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_appl_components to alcs.application_boundary_amendment.

table.name: application_boundary_amendments_to_components
table.remarks: Links Boundary Amendments to the Decision Components they result from

table.name: application_ceo_criterion_code
table.remarks: Code table for criteria under which the CEO can make a decision on an application

table.name: application_decision
table.remarks: Decisions saved to applications, incl. those linked to the recon/modification request

column.name: is_draft
column.remarks: Indicates whether the decision is currently draft or not

column.name: is_subject_to_conditions
column.remarks: Indicates whether the decision is subject to conditions

column.name: decision_description
column.remarks: Staff input field for a description of the decision

column.name: rescinded_date
column.remarks: Date when decision was rescinded

column.name: rescinded_comment
column.remarks: Comment provided by the staff when the decision was rescinded

column.name: created_at
column.remarks: Date that indicates when decision was created. It is not editable by user.

column.name: oats_alr_appl_decision_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_appl_decisions to alcs.application_decisions.

column.name: email_sent
column.remarks: Used to track if/when the email was sent for this decision

column.name: cc_emails
column.remarks: Tracks extra emails to send the decision email to

table.name: application_decision_chair_review_outcome_type
table.remarks: Code table for the possible outcomes of the chair's application decision review

table.name: application_decision_component
table.remarks: Fields present on the application decision components

column.name: alr_area
column.remarks: Area in hectares of ALR impacted by the decision component

column.name: ag_cap
column.remarks: Agricultural cap classification

column.name: ag_cap_source
column.remarks: Agricultural capability classification system used

column.name: ag_cap_map
column.remarks: Agricultural capability map sheet reference

column.name: ag_cap_consultant
column.remarks: Consultant who determined the agricultural capability

column.name: nfu_type
column.remarks: Non-farm use type

column.name: nfu_sub_type
column.remarks: Non-farm use sub type

column.name: incl_excl_applicant_type
column.remarks: Stores the applicant type for inclusion and exclusion components

column.name: oats_alr_appl_component_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_appl_components to alcs.application_decision_component.

table.name: application_decision_component_lot
table.remarks: Approved lots on the subdivision decision component

table.name: application_decision_component_type
table.remarks: Code table for the possible application decision component types

table.name: application_decision_condition
table.remarks: Fields present on the application decision conditions

column.name: oats_condition_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_conditions to alcs.application_decision_condition.

table.name: application_decision_condition_card
table.remarks: Links application decision conditions with cards

table.name: application_decision_condition_component
table.remarks: Join table that links decision condition with decision components

table.name: application_decision_condition_component_plan_number
table.remarks: Survey plan numbers associated with survey plan conditions on decision components

table.name: application_decision_condition_date
table.remarks: Due/end dates for conditions

table.name: application_decision_condition_financial_instrument
table.remarks: Instrument for Financial Security Conditions

table.name: application_decision_condition_to_component_lot
table.remarks: Join table to link approved subdivision lots between condition and components and provide plan numbers associated with survey plan per lot

table.name: application_decision_condition_type
table.remarks: Code table for the possible application decision condition types

table.name: application_decision_document
table.remarks: Links application decision document with the decision it's saved to

table.name: application_decision_maker_code
table.remarks: Code table for the possible application decision makers

table.name: application_decision_meeting
table.remarks: Dates for application review discussions

table.name: application_decision_outcome_code
table.remarks: Code table for the possible application decision outcomes

table.name: application_document
table.remarks: Links application documents with the applications they're saved to and logs other attributes

column.name: oats_document_id
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

column.name: oats_application_id
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

column.name: audit_created_by
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

table.name: application_meeting
table.remarks: Actions that un/pause applications

table.name: application_meeting_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible action types that un/pause applications

table.name: application_modification
table.remarks: Application modification requests linked to card and application

column.name: description
column.remarks: Modification description provided by ALCS staff

column.name: oats_reconsideration_request_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_reconsideration_requests to alcs.application_modification.

table.name: application_modification_outcome_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible application modification review outcomes

table.name: application_modified_decisions
table.remarks: Links application modification requests with their resulting decisions

table.name: application_owner
table.remarks: Contact information, type, and corporate summary document UUID for owner or primary contact

column.name: oats_person_organization_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_person_organization to alcs.application_owner. Note that this id is unique only in scope of parcel.

column.name: oats_property_interest_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_property_interest to alcs.application_owner. Note that this id is unique only in scope of parcel.

column.name: oats_application_party_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_application_parties to alcs.application_owner.

table.name: application_parcel
table.remarks: Parcels associated with application submissions

column.name: pid
column.remarks: The Parcels pid entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: pin
column.remarks: The Parcels pin entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: legal_description
column.remarks: The Parcels legalDescription entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: map_area_hectares
column.remarks: The Parcels map are in hectares entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: is_farm
column.remarks: The Parcels indication whether it is used as a farm

column.name: purchased_date
column.remarks: The Parcels purchase date provided by user

column.name: is_confirmed_by_applicant
column.remarks: The Parcels indication whether applicant signed off provided data including the Certificate of Title

column.name: civic_address
column.remarks: The standard address for the parcel

column.name: oats_subject_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_subject_properties to alcs.application_parcel.

column.name: oats_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_properties to alcs.application_parcel.

table.name: application_parcel_owners_application_owner
table.remarks: Links application parcels with their owners

table.name: application_paused
table.remarks: Date ranges responsible for un/pausing an application

table.name: application_reconsideration
table.remarks: Application reconsideration requests linked to card and application

column.name: description
column.remarks: Reconsideration description provided by ALCS staff

column.name: oats_reconsideration_request_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_reconsideration_requests to alcs.application_reconsideration.

table.name: application_reconsideration_outcome_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible application reconsideration review outcomes

table.name: application_reconsideration_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible types of reconsiderations

table.name: application_reconsidered_decisions
table.remarks: Links reconsideration requests with their resulting decisions

table.name: application_region
table.remarks: Code table for possible administrative regions in the province

table.name: application_submission
table.remarks: Portal intake form fields for applications

column.name: file_number
column.remarks: File Number of attached application

column.name: applicant
column.remarks: The Applicants name on the application

column.name: local_government_uuid
column.remarks: UUID from ALCS System of the Local Government

column.name: returned_comment
column.remarks: Used to store comments when an Application is returned to the Applicant

column.name: parcels_agriculture_description
column.remarks: Describe all agriculture that currently takes place on the parcel(s).

column.name: parcels_agriculture_improvement_description
column.remarks: Describe all agricultural improvements made to the parcel(s).

column.name: parcels_non_agriculture_use_description
column.remarks: Describe all other uses that currently take place on the parcel(s).

column.name: north_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the North.

column.name: north_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the North.

column.name: east_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the East.

column.name: east_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the East.

column.name: south_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the South.

column.name: south_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the South.

column.name: west_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the West.

column.name: west_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the West.

column.name: primary_contact_owner_uuid
column.remarks: Stores Uuid of Owner Selected as Primary Contact

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: Application Type Code from ALCS System

column.name: has_other_parcels_in_community
column.remarks: Indicates whether application owners have other parcels in the community.

column.name: subd_proposed_lots
column.remarks: JSONB Column containing the proposed subdivision lots

column.name: is_draft
column.remarks: Indicates whether submission is currently draft or not

column.name: returned_to_lfng_comment
column.remarks: Used to store comments when an Application is returned to the L/FNG by ALC Staff

column.name: other_parcels_description
column.remarks: Stores the data user entered about other parcels in their community

column.name: naru_existing_residences
column.remarks: JSONB column containing NARU existing residences

column.name: naru_proposed_residences
column.remarks: JSONB column containing NARU proposed residences

column.name: soil_proposed_structures
column.remarks: JSONB Column containing the proposed structures

table.name: application_submission_review
table.remarks: Portal local or first nation government review form fields

table.name: application_submission_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT app_sub.uuid, app_sub.applicant, app.uuid AS application_uuid, "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, app_sub.file_number, app.type_code AS application_type_code, app.date_submitted_to_alc, app.decision_date, app.region_code AS application_region_code, NULL::text AS status FROM ((alcs.application_submission app_sub JOIN alcs.application app ON ((((app.file_number)::text = (app_sub.file_number)::text) AND (app.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON (((app_sub.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid) AND ("localGovernment".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) WHERE ((app_sub.is_draft IS NOT TRUE) AND (app_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: application_submission_status_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT file_number, alcs.get_current_status_for_application_submission_by_uuid(uuid) AS status FROM alcs.application_submission app_sub WHERE ((is_draft IS NOT TRUE) AND (audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: application_submission_status_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible application portal statuses

table.name: application_submission_to_submission_status
table.remarks: Join table that links submission with its status

column.name: email_sent_date
column.remarks: Applicable only for "REVA" (Under Review by ALC) and ALCD("Decision released") statuses all others always set to null

table.name: application_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible application types

table.name: board
table.remarks: Kanban boards that exist in ALCS

table.name: board_allowed_card_types_card_type
table.remarks: Card types allowed on each kanban board

table.name: board_create_card_types_card_type
table.remarks: Contains the type of cards can be created from each board

table.name: board_status
table.remarks: Columns on each kanban board

table.name: card
table.remarks: Kanban board cards

column.name: archived
column.remarks: Indicates if a card was manually archived by a User

table.name: card_history
table.remarks: History of card status i.e. the column history of the card's journey on boards

table.name: card_status
table.remarks: Code table for possible kanban columns that cards can be in

table.name: card_subtask
table.remarks: Attributes for card subtasks

table.name: card_subtask_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible subtask types

table.name: card_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible card types

table.name: comment
table.remarks: Attributes for card comments

table.name: comment_mention
table.remarks: Links comment mentions with the corresponding user

table.name: compliance_and_enforcement
table.remarks: Compliance and enforcement file

table.name: configuration
table.remarks: Stores real time config values editable by ALCS Admin.

table.name: covenant_transferee
table.remarks: Stores Transferees for Restrictive Covenant Applications

table.name: document
table.remarks: Attributes for documents including their ORCS classification

column.name: oats_application_id
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

column.name: oats_document_id
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

column.name: system
column.remarks: Front-end the document was uploaded from

column.name: oats_planning_review_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.documents/alcs.documents to alcs.document.

column.name: oats_issue_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.documents/alcs.documents to alcs.document.

table.name: document_code
table.remarks: Code table for possible document types

table.name: email_status
table.remarks: Success or failure of emails sent by ALCS

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: Transaction ID returned by CHES

column.name: parent_type
column.remarks: Type of parent entity

column.name: parent_id
column.remarks: Uuid of parent entity

column.name: trigger_status
column.remarks: Status that triggered the email

table.name: file_viewed
table.remarks: Stores when the file(Application, NOI etc.) was last viewed.

table.name: health_check
table.remarks: Unix timestamp of the last time the connection from API to database was checked and succeeded

table.name: holiday_entity
table.remarks: Holidays used by the application active day tracking function

column.name: uuid
column.remarks: Unique identifier that is safe to share.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Unique name of the stat holiday.

column.name: day
column.remarks: Unique date that is considered as a holiday and will be skipped in the business days calculation process.

table.name: inbox_application_submission_view
table.viewSql: SELECT app_sub.uuid, app_sub.applicant, app.uuid AS application_uuid, app_sub.file_number, app_sub.created_by_uuid, app_sub.local_government_uuid, app_sub.audit_created_at AS created_at, "user".bceid_business_guid, app_sub.type_code AS application_type_code, app.date_submitted_to_alc, GREATEST(status_link.effective_date, decision_date.date) AS last_update, alcs.get_current_status_for_application_submission_by_uuid(app_sub.uuid) AS status FROM ((((alcs.application_submission app_sub JOIN alcs.application app ON ((((app.file_number)::text = (app_sub.file_number)::text) AND (app.hide_from_portal = false) AND (app.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs."user" "user" ON ((("user".uuid = app_sub.created_by_uuid) AND ("user".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(status_link_1.effective_date) AS effective_date, status_link_1.submission_uuid FROM alcs.application_submission_to_submission_status status_link_1 WHERE (status_link_1.effective_date <= now()) GROUP BY status_link_1.submission_uuid) status_link ON ((status_link.submission_uuid = app_sub.uuid))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(decision_date_1.date) AS date, decision_date_1.application_uuid FROM alcs.application_decision decision_date_1 WHERE ((decision_date_1.date <= now()) AND (decision_date_1.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)) GROUP BY decision_date_1.application_uuid) decision_date ON ((decision_date.application_uuid = app.uuid))) WHERE ((app_sub.is_draft = false) AND (app_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: inbox_notice_of_intent_submission_view
table.viewSql: SELECT noi_sub.uuid, noi_sub.applicant, noi.uuid AS notice_of_intent_uuid, noi_sub.file_number, noi_sub.audit_created_at AS created_at, noi_sub.created_by_uuid, noi_sub.local_government_uuid, "user".bceid_business_guid, noi_sub.type_code AS notice_of_intent_type_code, noi.date_submitted_to_alc, GREATEST(status_link.effective_date, decision_date.date) AS last_update, alcs.get_current_status_for_notice_of_intent_submission_by_uuid(noi_sub.uuid) AS status FROM ((((alcs.notice_of_intent_submission noi_sub JOIN alcs.notice_of_intent noi ON ((((noi.file_number)::text = (noi_sub.file_number)::text) AND (noi.hide_from_portal = false) AND (noi.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs."user" "user" ON ((("user".uuid = noi_sub.created_by_uuid) AND ("user".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(status_link_1.effective_date) AS effective_date, status_link_1.submission_uuid FROM alcs.notice_of_intent_submission_to_submission_status status_link_1 WHERE (status_link_1.effective_date <= now()) GROUP BY status_link_1.submission_uuid) status_link ON ((status_link.submission_uuid = noi_sub.uuid))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(decision_date_1.date) AS date, decision_date_1.notice_of_intent_uuid FROM alcs.notice_of_intent_decision decision_date_1 WHERE ((decision_date_1.date <= now()) AND (decision_date_1.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)) GROUP BY decision_date_1.notice_of_intent_uuid) decision_date ON ((decision_date.notice_of_intent_uuid = noi.uuid))) WHERE ((noi_sub.is_draft = false) AND (noi_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: inbox_notification_submission_view
table.viewSql: SELECT noti_sub.uuid, noti_sub.applicant, noti.uuid AS notification_uuid, noti_sub.file_number, noti_sub.audit_created_at AS created_at, noti_sub.created_by_uuid, noti_sub.local_government_uuid, "user".bceid_business_guid, noti.type_code AS notification_type_code, noti.date_submitted_to_alc, alcs.get_current_status_for_notification_submission_by_uuid(noti_sub.uuid) AS status FROM ((alcs.notification_submission noti_sub LEFT JOIN alcs."user" "user" ON ((("user".uuid = noti_sub.created_by_uuid) AND ("user".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) JOIN alcs.notification noti ON ((((noti.file_number)::text = (noti_sub.file_number)::text) AND (noti.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) WHERE (noti_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL);

table.name: inquiry
table.remarks: Inquiries from the public or other agencies that require a response from the ALC.

table.name: inquiry_document
table.remarks: Stores inquiry documents

column.name: oats_document_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.documents/alcs.documents to alcs.inquiry_document.

column.name: oats_issue_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.documents/alcs.documents to alcs.inquiry_document.

table.name: inquiry_parcel
table.remarks: Parcels associated with the inquiries

column.name: pid
column.remarks: The Parcels pid entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: pin
column.remarks: The Parcels pin entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: civic_address
column.remarks: The standard address for the parcel

column.name: oats_subject_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_subject_properties to alcs.inquiry_parcel.

column.name: oats_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_properties to alcs.inquiry_parcel.

table.name: inquiry_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT inquiry.uuid AS inquiry_uuid, inquiry.open, "inquiryType".audit_deleted_date_at AS "inquiryType_audit_deleted_date_at", "inquiryType".audit_created_at AS "inquiryType_audit_created_at", "inquiryType".audit_updated_at AS "inquiryType_audit_updated_at", "inquiryType".audit_created_by AS "inquiryType_audit_created_by", "inquiryType".audit_updated_by AS "inquiryType_audit_updated_by", "inquiryType".label AS "inquiryType_label", "inquiryType".code AS "inquiryType_code", "inquiryType".description AS "inquiryType_description", "inquiryType".short_label AS "inquiryType_short_label", "inquiryType".background_color AS "inquiryType_background_color", "inquiryType".text_color AS "inquiryType_text_color", "inquiryType".html_description AS "inquiryType_html_description", "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, inquiry.file_number, inquiry.inquirer_first_name, inquiry.inquirer_last_name, inquiry.inquirer_organization, inquiry.type_code AS inquiry_type_code, inquiry.date_submitted_to_alc FROM ((alcs.inquiry inquiry JOIN alcs.inquiry_type "inquiryType" ON (((inquiry.type_code = "inquiryType".code) AND ("inquiryType".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON (((inquiry.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid) AND ("localGovernment".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) WHERE (inquiry.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL);

table.name: inquiry_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible inquiry types

table.name: local_government
table.remarks: Status, type, BCeID, and contact info of local or first nation governments

table.name: message
table.remarks: In-app messages

table.name: migrations
table.remarks: Database migration history recorded by typeorm

table.name: naru_subtype
table.remarks: Code table for possible subtypes of Non-Adhering Residential Use applications

table.name: noi_submission_status_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT file_number, alcs.get_current_status_for_notice_of_intent_submission_by_uuid(uuid) AS status FROM alcs.notice_of_intent_submission noi_sub WHERE ((is_draft IS NOT TRUE) AND (audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: notice_of_intent
table.remarks: Base data for Notice of Intents incl. the ID, key dates, and the date of the first decision

column.name: source
column.remarks: Determines where the NOI came from

column.name: alr_area
column.remarks: Area in hectares of ALR impacted by the proposal

column.name: ag_cap
column.remarks: Agricultural cap classification

column.name: ag_cap_source
column.remarks: Agricultural capability classification system used

column.name: ag_cap_map
column.remarks: Agricultural capability map sheet reference

column.name: ag_cap_consultant
column.remarks: Consultant who determined the agricultural capability

column.name: staff_observations
column.remarks: ALC Staff Observations and Comments

column.name: legacy_id
column.remarks: NOI Id that is applicable only to paper version applications from 70s - 80s

column.name: created_at
column.remarks: The date at which the noi was created in OATS

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision
table.remarks: Decisions saved to NOIs, linked to the modification request

column.name: created_at
column.remarks: Date that indicates when decision was created. It is not editable by user.

column.name: is_draft
column.remarks: Indicates whether the decision is currently draft or not

column.name: is_subject_to_conditions
column.remarks: Indicates whether the decision is subject to conditions

column.name: decision_description
column.remarks: Staff input field for a description of the decision

column.name: rescinded_date
column.remarks: Date when decision was rescinded

column.name: rescinded_comment
column.remarks: Comment provided by the staff when the decision was rescinded

column.name: oats_alr_appl_decision_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_appl_decisions to alcs.notice_of_intent_decisions.

column.name: email_sent
column.remarks: Used to track if/when the email was sent for this decision

column.name: cc_emails
column.remarks: Tracks extra emails to send the decision email to

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_component
table.remarks: Decision Components for Notice of Intents

column.name: alr_area
column.remarks: Area in hectares of ALR impacted by the decision component

column.name: ag_cap
column.remarks: Agricultural cap classification

column.name: ag_cap_source
column.remarks: Agricultural capability classification system used

column.name: ag_cap_map
column.remarks: Agricultural capability map sheet reference

column.name: ag_cap_consultant
column.remarks: Consultant who determined the agricultural capability

column.name: oats_alr_appl_component_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_appl_components to alcs.notice_of_intent_decision_component.

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_component_type

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_condition

column.name: oats_condition_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_conditions to alcs.notice_of_intent_decision_condition.

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_condition_card
table.remarks: Links notice of intent decision conditions with cards

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_condition_component
table.remarks: Tracks Conditions links Components

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_condition_date
table.remarks: Due/end dates for conditions

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_condition_financial_instrument
table.remarks: Instrument for Financial Security Conditions

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_condition_type
table.remarks: Decision Condition Types Code Table for Notice of Intents

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_document
table.remarks: Links NOI decision document with the decision it's saved to

table.name: notice_of_intent_decision_outcome
table.remarks: Code table for possible NOI decision outcomes

table.name: notice_of_intent_document
table.remarks: Links NOI documents with the NOIs they're saved to and logs other attributes

column.name: oats_document_id
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

column.name: oats_application_id
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

column.name: audit_created_by
column.remarks: used only for oats etl process

table.name: notice_of_intent_meeting
table.remarks: Actions that un/pause NOIs

table.name: notice_of_intent_meeting_type

table.name: notice_of_intent_modification

column.name: oats_reconsideration_request_id

table.name: notice_of_intent_modification_outcome_type

table.name: notice_of_intent_modified_decisions

column.name: oats_person_organization_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_person_organization to alcs.notice_of_intent_owner. Note that this id is unique only in scope of parcel.

column.name: oats_application_party_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_application_parties to alcs.notice_of_intent_owner.

column.name: oats_property_interest_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_property_interest to alcs.notice_of_intent_owner.

column.name: pid
column.remarks: The Parcels pid entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: pin
column.remarks: The Parcels pin entered by the user or populated from third-party data

column.name: legal_description

column.name: civic_address

column.name: map_area_hectares

column.name: is_farm
column.remarks: The Parcels indication whether it is used as a farm

column.name: purchased_date
column.remarks: The Parcels purchase date provided by user

column.name: is_confirmed_by_applicant
column.remarks: The Parcels indication whether applicant signed off provided data including the Certificate of Title

column.name: oats_subject_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_subject_properties to alcs.notice_of_intent_parcel.

column.name: oats_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_properties to alcs.notice_of_intent_parcel.

table.name: notice_of_intent_parcel_owners_notice_of_intent_owner
table.remarks: Join table that links Owners to Parcels

table.name: notice_of_intent_parcel_ownership_type
table.remarks: Parcel Ownership types used for NOI Parcels

table.name: notice_of_intent_submission
table.remarks: Portal intake form fields for NOIs

column.name: file_number
column.remarks: File Number of attached application

column.name: is_draft
column.remarks: Indicates whether submission is currently draft or not

column.name: applicant
column.remarks: The Applicants name on the application

column.name: local_government_uuid
column.remarks: UUID from ALCS System of the Local Government

column.name: purpose
column.remarks: The purpose of the application

column.name: parcels_agriculture_description
column.remarks: Describe all agriculture that currently takes place on the parcel(s).

column.name: parcels_agriculture_improvement_description
column.remarks: Describe all agricultural improvements made to the parcel(s).

column.name: parcels_non_agriculture_use_description
column.remarks: Describe all other uses that currently take place on the parcel(s).

column.name: north_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the North.

column.name: north_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the North.

column.name: east_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the East.

column.name: east_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the East.

column.name: south_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the South.

column.name: south_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the South.

column.name: west_land_use_type
column.remarks: The land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the West.

column.name: west_land_use_type_description
column.remarks: Description of the land uses surrounding the parcel(s) under application on the West.

column.name: primary_contact_owner_uuid
column.remarks: Stores Uuid of Owner Selected as Primary Contact

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: Notice of Intent Type Code

column.name: soil_proposed_structures
column.remarks: JSONB Column containing the proposed structures

table.name: notice_of_intent_submission_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT nois.uuid, nois.applicant, noi.uuid AS notice_of_intent_uuid, "noticeOfIntentType".audit_deleted_date_at AS "noticeOfIntentType_audit_deleted_date_at", "noticeOfIntentType".audit_created_at AS "noticeOfIntentType_audit_created_at", "noticeOfIntentType".audit_updated_at AS "noticeOfIntentType_audit_updated_at", "noticeOfIntentType".audit_created_by AS "noticeOfIntentType_audit_created_by", "noticeOfIntentType".audit_updated_by AS "noticeOfIntentType_audit_updated_by", "noticeOfIntentType".label AS "noticeOfIntentType_label", "noticeOfIntentType".code AS "noticeOfIntentType_code", "noticeOfIntentType".description AS "noticeOfIntentType_description", "noticeOfIntentType".short_label AS "noticeOfIntentType_short_label", "noticeOfIntentType".background_color AS "noticeOfIntentType_background_color", "noticeOfIntentType".text_color AS "noticeOfIntentType_text_color", "noticeOfIntentType".html_description AS "noticeOfIntentType_html_description", "noticeOfIntentType".portal_label AS "noticeOfIntentType_portal_label", "noticeOfIntentType".alc_fee_amount AS "noticeOfIntentType_alc_fee_amount", "noticeOfIntentType".government_fee_amount AS "noticeOfIntentType_government_fee_amount", "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, nois.file_number, nois.local_government_uuid, nois.type_code AS notice_of_intent_type_code, nois.is_draft, noi.date_submitted_to_alc, noi.legacy_id, noi.decision_date, noi.region_code AS notice_of_intent_region_code, NULL::text AS status FROM (((alcs.notice_of_intent_submission nois JOIN alcs.notice_of_intent noi ON ((((noi.file_number)::text = (nois.file_number)::text) AND (noi.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) JOIN alcs.notice_of_intent_type "noticeOfIntentType" ON (((nois.type_code)::text = "noticeOfIntentType".code))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON ((nois.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid))) WHERE (nois.is_draft IS NOT TRUE);

table.name: notice_of_intent_submission_status_type

table.name: notice_of_intent_submission_to_submission_status

column.name: email_sent_date

table.name: notice_of_intent_subtype

table.name: notice_of_intent_subtype_notice_of_intent_subtype
table.remarks: Links NOI subtypes to the NOI it's saved to (many to one relationship)

table.name: notice_of_intent_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible NOI types

column.name: oats_document_id

column.name: oats_application_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.alr_application to alcs.notification_document.

column.name: legal_description

column.name: map_area_hectares

column.name: oats_property_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_properties to alcs.notification_parcel.

table.name: notification_submission

column.name: file_number

column.name: applicant

column.name: local_government_uuid

column.name: purpose

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: SRW Type Code

column.name: contact_first_name
column.remarks: Primary Contacts First Name

column.name: contact_last_name
column.remarks: Primary Contacts Last Name

column.name: contact_organization

column.name: contact_phone
column.remarks: Primary Contacts Phone

column.name: contact_email
column.remarks: Primary Contacts Email

column.name: submitters_file_number
column.remarks: File number provided by Applicant from the LTSA

table.name: notification_submission_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT noti_sub.uuid, noti_sub.applicant, noti.uuid AS notification_uuid, "notificationType".audit_deleted_date_at AS "notificationType_audit_deleted_date_at", "notificationType".audit_created_at AS "notificationType_audit_created_at", "notificationType".audit_updated_at AS "notificationType_audit_updated_at", "notificationType".audit_created_by AS "notificationType_audit_created_by", "notificationType".audit_updated_by AS "notificationType_audit_updated_by", "notificationType".label AS "notificationType_label", "notificationType".code AS "notificationType_code", "notificationType".description AS "notificationType_description", "notificationType".short_label AS "notificationType_short_label", "notificationType".background_color AS "notificationType_background_color", "notificationType".text_color AS "notificationType_text_color", "notificationType".html_description AS "notificationType_html_description", "notificationType".portal_label AS "notificationType_portal_label", "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, noti_sub.file_number, noti_sub.local_government_uuid, noti.type_code AS notification_type_code, noti.date_submitted_to_alc, noti.region_code AS notification_region_code, NULL::text AS status FROM (((alcs.notification_submission noti_sub JOIN alcs.notification noti ON ((((noti.file_number)::text = (noti_sub.file_number)::text) AND (noti.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) JOIN alcs.notification_type "notificationType" ON (((noti_sub.type_code)::text = "notificationType".code))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON ((noti.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid)));

table.name: notification_submission_status_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT file_number, alcs.get_current_status_for_notification_submission_by_uuid(uuid) AS status FROM alcs.notification_submission not_sub WHERE (audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL);

table.name: notification_submission_status_type
table.remarks: Statuses for Notification Submissions

table.name: notification_submission_to_submission_status
table.remarks: Links Notifications to their Statuses with Dates

table.name: notification_transferee
table.remarks: The Transferees related to Notification Applications

column.name: oats_alr_application_party_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.oats_alr_application_parties to alcs.notification_transferee.

table.name: notification_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible Notification types

table.name: owner_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible types of owners or primary contacts

table.name: parcel_lookup
table.remarks: Data from ParcelMapBC for use in the Portal

table.name: parcel_ownership_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible land ownership types (Fee simple vs Crown)

table.name: planning_referral
table.remarks: Planning Referrals represent each pass of a Planning Review with their own cards

table.name: planning_review
table.remarks: A review of a local government or municipalities plan

column.name: legacy_id
column.remarks: Application Id that is applicable only to paper version applications from 70s - 80s

table.name: planning_review_decision
table.remarks: Links Planning Review decision document with the decision it's saved to

column.name: is_draft
column.remarks: Indicates whether the decision is currently draft or not

column.name: decision_description
column.remarks: Staff input field for a description of the decision

column.name: created_at
column.remarks: Date that indicates when decision was created. It is not editable by user.

table.name: planning_review_decision_document
table.remarks: Links Planning Review decision document with the decision it's saved to

table.name: planning_review_decision_outcome_code
table.remarks: Possible decision outcome types for Planning Review

table.name: planning_review_document
table.remarks: Stores planning review documents

column.name: oats_document_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.documents/alcs.documents to alcs.planning_review_document.

column.name: oats_planning_review_id
column.remarks: This column is NOT related to any functionality in ALCS. It is only used for ETL and backtracking of imported data from OATS. It links oats.documents/alcs.documents to alcs.planning_review_document.

table.name: planning_review_meeting
table.remarks: Meeting schedule for Planning Reviews

column.name: date
column.remarks: Date of the meeting

table.name: planning_review_meeting_type
table.remarks: Meetings Types for Planning Review Meetings

table.name: planning_review_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT planning_review.uuid, planning_review.open, "planningReviewType".audit_deleted_date_at AS "planningReviewType_audit_deleted_date_at", "planningReviewType".audit_created_at AS "planningReviewType_audit_created_at", "planningReviewType".audit_updated_at AS "planningReviewType_audit_updated_at", "planningReviewType".audit_created_by AS "planningReviewType_audit_created_by", "planningReviewType".audit_updated_by AS "planningReviewType_audit_updated_by", "planningReviewType".label AS "planningReviewType_label", "planningReviewType".code AS "planningReviewType_code", "planningReviewType".description AS "planningReviewType_description", "planningReviewType".short_label AS "planningReviewType_short_label", "planningReviewType".background_color AS "planningReviewType_background_color", "planningReviewType".text_color AS "planningReviewType_text_color", "planningReviewType".html_description AS "planningReviewType_html_description", "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, planning_referral.planning_referral_uuid, planning_referral.submission_date, planning_referral.planning_review_uuid, planning_review.file_number, planning_review.document_name, planning_referral.submission_date AS date_submitted_to_alc, planning_review.local_government_uuid, planning_review.type_code AS planning_review_type_code, planning_review.region_code FROM (((alcs.planning_review planning_review JOIN alcs.planning_review_type "planningReviewType" ON (((planning_review.type_code = "planningReviewType".code) AND ("planningReviewType".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON (((planning_review.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid) AND ("localGovernment".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT planning_referral_1.uuid AS planning_referral_uuid, planning_referral_1.submission_date, planning_referral_1.planning_review_uuid FROM (alcs.planning_referral planning_referral_1 JOIN ( SELECT child_1.planning_review_uuid, min(child_1.audit_created_at) AS audit_created_at FROM alcs.planning_referral child_1 WHERE (child_1.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL) GROUP BY child_1.planning_review_uuid) child ON (((planning_referral_1.audit_created_at = child.audit_created_at) AND (planning_referral_1.planning_review_uuid = child.planning_review_uuid)))) WHERE (planning_referral_1.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)) planning_referral ON ((planning_review.uuid = planning_referral.planning_review_uuid))) WHERE (planning_review.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL);

table.name: planning_review_type
table.remarks: Code table for possible Planning Review types

table.name: public_application_submission_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT app_sub.uuid, app_sub.applicant, "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, app_sub.file_number, app_sub.type_code AS application_type_code, app.date_submitted_to_alc, decision_date.outcome, GREATEST(status_link.effective_date, decision_date.date) AS last_update, alcs.get_current_status_for_application_submission_by_uuid(app_sub.uuid) AS status FROM ((((alcs.application_submission app_sub JOIN alcs.application app ON ((((app.file_number)::text = (app_sub.file_number)::text) AND (app.hide_from_portal = false) AND (app.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON (((app_sub.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid) AND ("localGovernment".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(status_link_1.effective_date) AS effective_date, status_link_1.submission_uuid FROM alcs.application_submission_to_submission_status status_link_1 WHERE (status_link_1.effective_date <= now()) GROUP BY status_link_1.submission_uuid) status_link ON ((status_link.submission_uuid = app_sub.uuid))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (decisions.applicationuuid) decisions.decisiondate AS date, decisions.outcome, decisions.dest_rank, decisions.applicationuuid AS application_uuid FROM ( SELECT decision.outcome_code AS outcome, decision.date AS decisiondate, decision.application_uuid AS applicationuuid, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY decision.application_uuid ORDER BY decision.date DESC, decision.audit_created_at DESC) AS dest_rank FROM alcs.application_decision decision WHERE ((decision.is_draft = false) AND (decision.date <= now()) AND (decision.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL))) decisions WHERE (decisions.dest_rank = 1)) decision_date ON ((decision_date.application_uuid = app.uuid))) WHERE ((app_sub.is_draft = false) AND ((app.date_received_all_items IS NOT NULL) AND (app.date_received_all_items <= now())) AND ((alcs.get_current_status_for_application_submission_by_uuid(app_sub.uuid) ->> 'status_type_code'::text) <> 'CANC'::text) AND (app_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: public_notice_of_intent_submission_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT noi_sub.uuid, noi_sub.applicant, "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, noi_sub.file_number, noi_sub.type_code AS notice_of_intent_type_code, noi.date_submitted_to_alc, decision_date.outcome, GREATEST(status_link.effective_date, decision_date.date) AS last_update, alcs.get_current_status_for_notice_of_intent_submission_by_uuid(noi_sub.uuid) AS status FROM ((((alcs.notice_of_intent_submission noi_sub JOIN alcs.notice_of_intent noi ON ((((noi.file_number)::text = (noi_sub.file_number)::text) AND (noi.hide_from_portal = false) AND (noi.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON (((noi_sub.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid) AND ("localGovernment".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT max(status_link_1.effective_date) AS effective_date, status_link_1.submission_uuid FROM alcs.notice_of_intent_submission_to_submission_status status_link_1 WHERE (status_link_1.effective_date <= now()) GROUP BY status_link_1.submission_uuid) status_link ON ((status_link.submission_uuid = noi_sub.uuid))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (decisions.notice_of_intentuuid) decisions.decisiondate AS date, decisions.outcome, decisions.dest_rank, decisions.notice_of_intentuuid AS notice_of_intent_uuid FROM ( SELECT decision.outcome_code AS outcome, decision.date AS decisiondate, decision.notice_of_intent_uuid AS notice_of_intentuuid, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY decision.notice_of_intent_uuid ORDER BY decision.date DESC, decision.audit_created_at DESC) AS dest_rank FROM alcs.notice_of_intent_decision decision WHERE ((decision.is_draft = false) AND (decision.date <= now()) AND (decision.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL))) decisions WHERE (decisions.dest_rank = 1)) decision_date ON ((decision_date.notice_of_intent_uuid = noi.uuid))) WHERE ((noi_sub.is_draft = false) AND ((noi.date_received_all_items IS NOT NULL) AND (noi.date_received_all_items <= now())) AND ((alcs.get_current_status_for_notice_of_intent_submission_by_uuid(noi_sub.uuid) ->> 'status_type_code'::text) <> 'CANC'::text) AND (noi_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: public_notification_submission_search_view
table.viewSql: SELECT noti_sub.uuid, noti_sub.applicant, "localGovernment".name AS local_government_name, noti_sub.file_number, noti.type_code AS notification_type_code, noti.date_submitted_to_alc, alcs.get_current_status_for_notification_submission_by_uuid(noti_sub.uuid) AS status FROM ((alcs.notification_submission noti_sub JOIN alcs.notification noti ON ((((noti.file_number)::text = (noti_sub.file_number)::text) AND (noti.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) LEFT JOIN alcs.local_government "localGovernment" ON (((noti.local_government_uuid = "localGovernment".uuid) AND ("localGovernment".audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL)))) WHERE (((alcs.get_current_status_for_notification_submission_by_uuid(noti_sub.uuid) ->> 'status_type_code'::text) = 'ALCR'::text) AND (noti_sub.audit_deleted_date_at IS NULL));

table.name: staff_journal
table.remarks: Staff journal entries saved to applications and NOIs, SRWs, Inquiries etc.

table.name: tag_category
table.remarks: Tag category.

table.name: user
table.remarks: Authenticated users and their attributes
